title: Introduction to C Programming
description: A course on C programming basics: syntax, variables, loops, and functions. Ideal for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Learn algorithm fundamentals: sorting, searching, and efficiency. Essential for computer science students.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Intro to using C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms: classes, templates, and standard libraries.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Explore data structures: arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees. Key for efficient coding.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn OOP concepts in Python: classes, inheritance, and polymorphism. Great for advanced Python learners.

title: Software Engineering
description: Comprehensive course on software development: methodologies, project management, and best practices.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: In-depth course on AWS: cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment strategies.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Beginner's guide to MySQL: database design, queries, and optimization techniques.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance problem-solving skills: practical algorithmic challenges and competitive programming.
